edu.csus.plugin.securecodingassistant.rules

Class IDS07J_RuntimeExecMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.csus.plugin.securecodingassistant.rules.IDS07J_RuntimeExecMethod
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRule

    public class IDS07J_RuntimeExecMethod
extends Object
implements IRule
    Java Secure Coding Rule: IDS07-J. Sanitize untrusted data passed to the Runtime.exec() method

    Any command that is sent to Runtime.exec() must be sanitized. Rather than using Runtime.exec(), try some other alternatives.

    Author:
    Ben White
    See Also:
    Java Secure Coding Rule: IDS07-J
